intent_atoms.description: Automate regression tests across all corrupt fixtures to ensure tolerant parsing records documented issues and tree structures remain partial instead of aborting.
Regression tests must run on all corrupt fixtures and produce tolerant parsing records with documented issues while maintaining partial tree structures rather than aborting.
Surface corrupt corpus fixtures in UI smoke tests once table rendering harness is available.
UI smoke tests should display corrupt corpus fixtures after the table rendering harness becomes available.
Extend fixture metadata with size heuristics or playback notes to support downstream benchmarking prioritisation.
Fixture metadata must include size heuristics or playback notes when required by T5.4/T5.5 for prioritisation.

functional_units.name: Automated Regression Test Execution
functional_units.description: Runs regression tests across all corrupt fixtures, tolerating parsing errors and documenting issues while preserving partial tree structures.

functional_units.name: Corrupt Fixture UI Surface
functional_units.description: Displays corrupt corpus fixtures in UI smoke tests once table rendering harness is available.

functional_units.name: Fixture Metadata Extension
functional_units.description: Adds size heuristics or playback notes to fixture metadata for downstream benchmarking prioritization.
